title: Did not get an S token for getting an S on Yorick in ARAM

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Tittle, and yes i have mastery 5 on him. Did they make it so you could not get S tokens in ARAM?  Also if i wanted to submit a ticket, under what field would this be under?{{champion:83}}

replies.body: You can gain mastery experience on any map, but you'll only earn the [**mastery tokens**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284#h1q7) for levels 6-7 in SR normal and ranked games!

Can I ask 4 the reason behind this ? I mean sure , on Game mods like URF or Blood Moon I agree , but it is already so hard to get a S on ARAM, considering how much farm counts towards that S in a game mode that you don't farm much , that it almost feels unfair to the player not to get a token 4 the champion.
